data.title: Emmanuel Leroy Ladurie died: the historian of the 'Annales' studied the life of farmers
data.meta_description: A communist when he was young, he had left the party after the invasion of Hungary. His research on the influence of climate on human events is also fundamental
data.text: The historian Emmanuel Le Roy Ladurie died at the age of 94 The French author has published extensively on the rural world and the climate, which earned him the mockery of the time, in the years 1960-1970. 9 months ago·Paris, France Read Full Article The historian Emmanuel Le Roy Ladurie died at the age of 94 The French author has published extensively on the rural world and the climate, which earned him the mockery of the time, in the years 1960-1970. 9 months ago·Paris, France Read Full Article Publico Morreu o historiador francês Emmanuel Le Roy Ladurie, autor da História do Clima Antigo professor do Collège de France e presidente da Academia Francesa, o autor Emmanuel Le Roy Ladurie morreu aos 94 anos. Foi um pioneiro no estudo do impacto histórico das questões ambientais. 9 months ago·Portugal Read Full Article Publico Morreu o historiador francês Emmanuel Le Roy Ladurie, autor da História do Clima Antigo professor do Collège de France e presidente da Academia Francesa, o autor Emmanuel Le Roy Ladurie morreu aos 94 anos. Foi um pioneiro no estudo do impacto histórico das questões ambientais. 9 months ago·Portugal Read Full Article Emmanuel Leroy Ladurie died: the historian of the 'Annales' studied the life of farmers A communist when he was young, he had left the party after the invasion of Hungary. His research on the influence of climate on human events is also fundamental 9 months ago·Italy Read Full Article Emmanuel Leroy Ladurie died: the historian of the 'Annales' studied the life of farmers A communist when he was young, he had left the party after the invasion of Hungary. His research on the influence of climate on human events is also fundamental 9 months ago·Italy Read Full Article Le Monde The historian Emmanuel Le Roy Ladurie is dead Professeur au Collège de France, administrateur général de la Bibliothèque nationale, historien de l’époque moderne et du climat, Emmanuel Le Roy Ladurie s’est éteint le 22 novembre à l’âge de 94 ans. 9 months ago·Paris, France Read Full Article Le Monde The historian Emmanuel Le Roy Ladurie is dead Professeur au Collège de France, administrateur général de la Bibliothèque nationale, historien de l’époque moderne et du climat, Emmanuel Le Roy Ladurie s’est éteint le 22 novembre à l’âge de 94 ans. 9 months ago·Paris, France Read Full Article Sud Ouest L’historien Emmanuel Le Roy Ladurie est mort à l’âge de 94 ans Ses centres d’intérêt l’ont poussé à écrire aussi bien sur le monde rural, les inégalités ou encore le climat L’historien français Emmanuel Le Roy Ladurie, parmi les plus traduits en Europe et aux 9 months ago·France Read Full Article Sud Ouest L’historien Emmanuel Le Roy Ladurie est mort à l’âge de 94 ans Ses centres d’intérêt l’ont poussé à écrire aussi bien sur le monde rural, les inégalités ou encore le climat L’historien français Emmanuel Le Roy Ladurie, parmi les plus traduits en Europe et aux 9 months ago·France Read Full Article
